issue.title: [CF 661] feature request: cast time display for non-active spell
issue.body:
Please provide any additional information below (including any export strings if applicable; see above.)

Basic idea is to setup a spell icon of one my spells and show text of its current cast time which updates to any haste procs or effects.  Specifically spells that are non active as there are cast bar addons that can display active casting speed.


> Posted by CurseForge user syrant | Imported from CurseForge issue #661 | Raw

comments.body:
I don't have access to LibDogTag's repository anymore, so I can't implement this myself. You will have to open a ticket for LibDogTag, but unfortunately, the project has gone into maintenance only mode, so implementation of new features is highly unlikely.

Sorry about this.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
